document.full_text: she once performed in new york's small bars searching for followers, but pop's reigning queen lady gaga will likely score a huge audience when her second full-length studio album is officially released next week.
document.title: lady gaga finally hatches "born this way"
lines_and_colors: she once performed in new york's small bars searching for followers, but pop's reigning queen lady gaga will likely score a huge audience when her second full-length studio album is officially released next week.
